pages.text: aur yaqinan Isa(alaihissalaam) qayaamath ki alaamath hai, pas tum (qayaamath) ke baare mein shak na karo aur meri taabedaari karo, yahi sidhi raah hai
aur shaytaan tumhe rok na de yaqinan wo tumhaara sarih dushman hai

aur jab Isa(alaihissalaam) maujeze laaye to kaha ke main tumhaare paas hikmath laaya hoon aur is liye aaya hoon ke jin baaz chizo mein tum muqtalif ho, unhe waaze kar doon pas tum Allah ta’ala se daro aur mera kaha maano
mera aur tumhara rab faqt Allah ta’ala hee hai, pas tum sab us ki ibaadath karo, raahe raast(yahi) hai
phir (bani israel ki) jamaato ne aapas mein eqtelaaf kiya, pas zaalimo ke liye qaraabi hai, dukh waale din ki aafath se
ye log sirf qayaamath ke muntazir hai ke wo achaanak in par aa pade aur unhe qabar bhi na ho
us din (gehre) dosth bhi ek dosre ke dushman ban jayenge sivaaye parhezgaaro ke
mere bandho! aaj to tum par koyi khauf (wa hiraas) hai aur na tum (badh dil aur) ghamzada hoge
jo hamaari aayato par imaan laaye aur thein bhi wo (farmabardaar) musalmaan
tum aur tumhaari biwiya hasshaash basshaash (raazi khushi) jannath mein chale jaao

un ke chaaro taraf se sone ki rikaabiya aur sone ke gilaaso ka daur chalaya jayega, un ke ji jis cheez ki qaahish kare aur jis se un ki aankhe lazzath paaye sab wahaa hoga aur tum us mein hamesha rahoge
yahi wo bahisht hai ke tum apne amaal ke badhle is ke waaris banaaye gaye ho
yahaa tumhaare liye ba kasrath mewe hai jinhe tum khaate rahoge
